optics.text: Latest re-design of the objective assembly for the microscopy apparatus.
Most recent PRL publication which demonstrated for the first time sub-femtonewton force measurements in fluid. Supplemental Info | Press Summary
Most recent conference presentation at META 2016 (Malaga, Spain).
2014 PNAS paper on evanescent wave microscopy method with absolute separation data.
Internal presentation explaining the basics of the theory of Casimir forces.

astro.text: Deep in the southern night sky are two hazy balls of light.  They are the Large and Small Magellanic Clouds: dwarf galaxies residing within the dark matter halo of our own Milky Way. Their presence has been a source of mystery to cosmologists, as LCDM cosmological models predict that in the larger universe they should be very rare...
Powerpoint presentation on our statistical method, and the important cosmological questions it helped answer.
ApJ paper on our method of counting dwarf galaxies in the Sloan Digital Sky Survey with inadequate red-shift information.
